channel.title: How to fix teleport glitch for pimpscape

item.title: How to fix teleport glitch for pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @dcrrco dcrrco
item.description:
@dcrrco wrote:

for everyone that uses pimpscape that gets mad at not being able to teleport i found out how to fix it

Search in your client.java for

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

and change the trues to false and you can know teleport on pimpscape

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix teleport glitch for pimpscape
